thread.title: Voices: Gretchen Lucas, on How Best to Work With Affluent Clients
thread.title_full: Voices: Gretchen Lucas, on How Best to Work With Affluent Clients - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Gretchen Lucas, on How Best to Work With Affluent Clients
text:
Voices is an occasional feature in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. Gretchen Lucas is a lawyer and managing director of family-office services at Boston Private Wealth in San Francisco.
I have enjoyed and would recommend working with high-net-worth families on their wealth and legacy-management needs. Yet this client group comes with unique challenges that any financial adviser should be... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
